1#pragma once
2
3#include "config.h"
4#include "sensorModel.h"
5#include "utils.h"
6
7const std::vector<std::pair<Eigen::Vector2f, Eigen::Vector2f>> LINES = {
8 {{-1.78308, 0}, {1.78308, 0}},
9 {{-1.78308, 1.47828}, {1.78308, 1.47828}},
10 {{-1.78308, -1.47828}, {1.78308, -1.47828}},
11};
12
13const std::vector<float> LINES_Y = {
14 0.0,
15 1.47828,
16 -1.47828,
17};
18
19class LineSensorModel : public SensorModel {
20private:
21 Eigen::Vector2f sensorOffset;
22 pros::adi::LineSensor lineSensor;
23 bool measured{false};
24public:
25 LineSensorModel(Eigen::Vector2f sensor_offset, pros::adi::LineSensor line_sensor)
26 : sensorOffset(std::move(sensor_offset)),
27 lineSensor(std::move(line_sensor)) {
28 }
29
30 void update() override {
31 measured = this->lineSensor.get_value() < LOCO_CONFIG::LINE_SENSOR_THRESHOLD;
32 }
33
34 std::optional<double> p(const Eigen::Vector3f& x) override {
35 Eigen::Vector2f sensor_position = Eigen::Rotation2Df(x.z()) * sensorOffset + x.head<2>();
36
37 auto predictedDistance = 50.0_m;
38
39 for (float lines_y : LINES_Y) {
40 predictedDistance = std::min(abs(sensor_position.y() - lines_y) * metre, predictedDistance);
41 }
42
43 const auto predicted = predictedDistance < LOCO_CONFIG::LINE_SENSOR_DISTANCE_THRESHOLD;
44
45 if (predicted && measured) {
46 return 1.0 * LOCO_CONFIG::LINE_WEIGHT;
47 } else if (!predicted && !measured) {
48 return 1.0 * LOCO_CONFIG::LINE_WEIGHT;
49 } else {
50 return 0.4 * LOCO_CONFIG::LINE_WEIGHT;
51 }
52 }
53
54 ~LineSensorModel() override = default;
55};
